name: Space Breaker Quantum Raccoon
description:
Space Breaker Quantum Raccoon was dispatched to reestablish the Equilibrium in the Universe. Therefore, he has to, obviously, run through platforms and not so much dangerous situations (at the least that's what they said).

Controls:

A or Left Arrow to Move Left

D or Right Arrow to Move Right

Space to Jump

Mouse to Aim

Mouse1 to Throw the Gear and Teleport to the Gear

Mouse2 to Recall the Gear
